.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<string, class Microsoft.Bot.Schema.TokenResponse>> GetAadTokensAsync(string userId, string connectionName, string[] resourceUrls, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: Name of the auth connection to use for AAD token exchange.
The collection of resource URLs for which to get tokens
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Docs.summary: Retrieve an Azure Active Directory token for particular AAD resources.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
Docs.remarks: If the task completes successfully, the response includes a collection of TokenResponse objects with the resourceUrl and its corresponding TokenResponse.

Docs.param: A serialized and encoded parameter of a TokenExchangeState parameter.
The endpoint URL for the final page of a succesful login attempt.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Docs.summary: Get the raw signin link to be sent to the user for signin for a connection name.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
Docs.remarks: If the task completes successfully and the call to the OAuth client is successful, the result contains the signin link.
